concept.title: Modifying the SMTP Mobility Account Settings

conbody.p: This tutorial explains how to modify the SMTP mobility account settings.

section.title: Procedure

li.p: Create an instance of the RArray <TSmtpMobilityAccount > class.

p.codeblock: CEmailAccounts:: GetSmtpMobilityAccountsL(const TSmtpAccount& aSmtpAccount, RArray<TSmtpMobilityAccount>& aAccounts)

li.p: Create an instance of the CImSmtpMobilitySettings class.
Populate the CImSmtpMobilitySettings class using the following function:

p.codeblock: CEmailAccounts:: LoadSmtpMobilitySettingsL(const TSmtpMobilityAccount& aAccount, CImSmtpMobilitySettings& aSettings)

li.p: Modify the email settings as required through CImSmtpMobilitySettings functions.
Save changes to the central repository using the following function:

p.codeblock: CEmailAccounts:: void SaveSmtpMobilitySettingsL(const TSmtpMobilityAccount& aAccount, const CImSmtpMobilitySettings& aSettings)

section.note: All instances of <protocol> in the preceding steps are either Imap4, Pop3, or Smtp.
